import React, { Component } from "react"; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch } from "react-router-dom"; import "../node_modules/react-vis/dist/style.css"; import "./App.css"; import Home from "./Home"; import Header from "./Header"; import { Hint, XYPlot, LineSeries, VerticalGridLines, HorizontalGridLines, XAxis, YAxis, VerticalBarSeries, HorizontalBarSeries, HeatmapSeries, RadialChart,Treemap } from "react-vis"; const MODE = [ 'circlePack', 'partition', 'partition-pivot', 'squarify', 'resquarify', 'slice', 'dice', 'slicedice', 'binary' ]; con class App extends Component { state={ value:false } render() { const{value} = this.state; const myData = [{angle:1},{angle:5},{angle:2}] const data = [ {x: 1, y: 0, color: 10}, {x: 1, y: 5, color: 10}, {x: 1, y: 10, color: 6}, {x: 1, y: 15, color: 7}, {x: 2, y: 0, color: 12}, {x: 2, y: 5, color: 2}, {x: 2, y: 10, color: 1}, {x: 2, y: 15, color: 12}, {x: 3, y: 0, color: 9}, {x: 3, y: 5, color: 2}, {x: 3, y: 10, color: 6}, {x: 3, y: 15, color: 12} ]; return (
this.setState({value:v})} onSeriesMouseOut={v => this.setState({value:false})} data={data}/> {value !== false && }
); } } export default App;
